SA05n810:4: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 1 ||
SA05n810:5: hṛṣṭo hūkāravajraḥ paśupatidamako vajraghaṇṭā ca hṛṣṭā
SA05n810:8: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 2 ||
SA05n810:12: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 3 ||
SA05n810:15: māyūrī māmakī ca kṣapitaripugaṇā pāṇḍarā rocanādyā-
SA05n810:16: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 4 ||
SA05n810:19: keyūrī jñānasārā dhvajanihitakarā ṣaṭkarā śābarī ca
SA05n810:20: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 5 ||
SA05n810:21: vaiṇyā mālyā sugītā prathitajinavare śābarī dhūpavajrā
SA05n810:24: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 6 ||
SA05n810:28: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 7 ||
SA05n810:29: chatraṃ dūrvā ca padmaṃ dhvajamapi nihitaṃ lo(ro)
SA05n810:33: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 8 ||
